scripts.clean:reports: (if exist cypress\reports rd /s /q cypress\reports) && mkdir cypress\reports
scripts.clean:results: (if exist cypress\results rd /s /q cypress\results) && mkdir cypress\results
scripts.pretest: npm run clean:reports && npm run clean:results
scripts.posttest: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test: npm run cypress:run || npm run posttest
scripts.test:chrome: npm run clean:reports && npm run clean:results && cypress run --browser chrome || npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test:firefox: npm run clean:reports && npm run clean:results && cypress run --browser firefox || npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test:edge: npm run clean:reports && npm run clean:results && cypress run --browser edge || npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
